column5: *Estimate only based on current premiums. If you proceed and purchase an AIA Health with AIA Vitality policy for the

column6: same life insured, a 5% Health and Life discount will be applied to the Lump Sum and Income Protection premiums at the
next billing cycle date. As AIA Vitality is included in the life insured?s health insurance policy, a 12.5% AIA Vitality discount
will be applied to the Lump Sum, and a 7.5% AIA Vitality discount will be applied to Income Protection premiums at the next
billing cycle date. The AIA Vitality Contribution Fee will also be waived for the PP policy. If the AIA Vitality Contribution Fee
is paid before the health policy commences, it will be refunded or pro-rata refunded, as applicable. If the health policy is
cancelled later for any reason, the 5% Health and Life premium discount will cease to apply, and the AIA Vitality
Contribution Fee must be paid to maintain membership of AIA Vitality and receive any applicable discounts on premiums.
